data.content:
noun
plural -abouts
[count] :turnaround
usually singular; often + in
There was a sharp turnabout in oil prices.
a turnabout in the country's foreign policy
turnabout is fair play
US - used to say that if someone does something to harm you it is fair for you to do something to harm that person
She did it to me, so I'm going to do it to her. Turnabout is fair play.
